text: Etiya moi laga itcha to apnikhan sob bhi alag bhasha te kotha koribo lage, kintu etu pora bhi bhabobani kora to he bisi itcha ase. Kilekoile jun bhabobani kore, taikhan to alag bhasha kora khan pora bhi dangor ase (notun bhasha laga motlob koi diya to girja te biswasi thaka khan ke uthabole nimite te ase).
